channel.title: Azure and more!
channel.description: A blog about Azure and more!

item.title: Azure AD Pod Identity
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Hi! I’m Josh, a Cloud Engineer working at a consultancy in Manchester, UK. I’ve been meaning to write on this site for a while, but never really found the time or motivation to do so. With the new year now in full swing, I’ve been inspired by various people in the Azure community (Gregor Suttie, Gwyneth Peña-Siguenza to name a few) to finally make a start. Hopefully you’ll learn something, but if nothing else, the posts on this site will be something I can refer back to in future to get a refresher on a topic.

item.title: Welcome!
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my new blogging site - joshops.co.uk. I’ll be blogging all about Azure and anything else I find interesting along the way. Follow me on Twitter to keep up to date with all new posts. The aim is to have at least 1 post per week, but life may get in the way of that!
